title: Game alt tabs when ever Clicking in game
body: So basicly 13/04/2017 everytime i load into a game and click somewhere on the screen i alt tab out. So if i clicked go to top turret,tab out, clickminimap tab out, litrally every time i click and it happend 2 games in a row even after i restarted the computer, ive tried reconnecting but it takes like 4 minutes to reconnect which normally it doesn't and by then the game has been remade and i am now facing leavebuster penalties for this fucking bug. Someone please can you help me?

replies.body: Did you try the suggestions [Porocles](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/s9vcW60P-game-alt-tabs-when-ever-clicking-in-game?comment=0000) posted?
Press every key on keyboard. Sometimes if a key sticks it can cause unusual things to occur, and a reboot wouldn't fix things.

That sounds pretty frustrating, and I'd like to help!  Are you on a PC or Mac?  What happens if you change your video settings to Windowed or Borderless?  I ask because I'm not sure if this issue is specific with the game, or maybe some setting with your OS.  Just as a first step for now, see if resetting your config could help in case of any issues with your files causing problems.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know!
